visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Sales' with data [10, 15, 13, 17, 20] and 'Expenses' with data [8, 12, 10, 14, 16]. The chart should use custom colors for the series and have additional configurations such as reduced margins, a white background, and a legend positioned at the bottom.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart includes two data series: 'Sales' and 'Expenses', each with specified data points. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. The chart has a white background and reduced margins for a cleaner look. The legend is positioned at the bottom of the chart, centered horizontally. This configuration ensures that the chart is visually appealing and easy to interpret.
